snippet.title: Survivors on Archipelago Island 2024
snippet.description:
Our new survival game. Now in the final stages of development. Release on Steam in the second half of 2024.

Demo version is available for free: https://frostfire-games.itch.io/archipelago

Survival in the open world on the archipelago island.
Features:
1. Over 400 different items and resources.
2. More than 200 unique enemies and NPS.
3. Neutral faction system, trade, reputation.
4. 9 types of weapons, as well as throwing weapons, potions, armor and jewelry that your character can wear.
5. Convenient inventory and crafting system. Quick access to nearby inventories.
6. 17 game factions.
7. And much more.
